description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Koh Samui, Thailand. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Adults-Only Koh Samui Beachfront Bliss with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Nightly Free-Flow Cocktail Hour
hotels.description: Step into bliss on the tropical coastline of Koh Samui at this adults-only beachfront hideaway framed by lush gardens, coconut groves and pristine sandy stretches. Rejuvenate in the glistening infinity pool at this five-star resort, spoil yourself at the spa and deepen your connection to mind and body with morning yoga sessions. Ready for five-star relaxation, romantic gastronomic indulgence and tropical mixology paired with laid-back island life? Feed your curiosity and set off on a gastronomic adventure at Odyssey restaurant - delight your senses with a cooking class or indulge in Mediterranean-inspired cuisine, choice cuts sizzled on a charcoal grill and woodfired pizzas. With one hour of daily free-flow beer, wine, spirits and cocktails included - chosen from an extensive menu of beloved classics and modern masterpieces, effortlessly prepared by Explorar's renowned team of mixologists - you'll be all set to kick back in paradise. Beyond the resort, discover Koh Samui's captivating beaches, mountainous jungle terrain and magnificent islands, all within easy reach. Soak up the spirited atmosphere of the nearby Bo Phut, home to Samui's famed Big Buddha Temple, or explore the vibrant Fisherman's Village. Make Explorar Koh Samui your home-away-from-home with its advanced fitness centre, plus a well-equipped co-working space perfect for the digital nomad looking for the best of both worlds.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Koh Samui Clifftop Pool Villas with In-Villa Banquet, Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
hotels.description: Escape to clifftop luxury at Samujana Villas, an exclusive award-winning collection of 23 spectacular pool villas perched above the Gulf of Thailand. Featured in season three of HBO’s ‘The White Lotus’, this hillside sanctuary is made for indulgence - think breathtaking ocean views from your private oversized infinity pool, spacious indoor-outdoor living areas and your own dedicated villa manager to take care of every detail. The only resort on the island to be awarded Three Michelin Keys, you'll be able to spend your days soaking up the island sunshine or entertaining in style with expansive dining spaces, fully equipped kitchens and the latest in-villa entertainment systems. Savour chef-prepared meals, unwind with blissful in-villa spa treatments and let your in-villa attendant handle the rest - so you never have to lift a finger. Perfect for families or groups of friends, with some villas accommodating up to 11 guests, you’ll enjoy access to a range of on-site activities including tennis, yoga and Muay Thai boxing classes, while activities such as windsurfing and diving are available nearby. And when you’re ready to explore, you’re just minutes from Koh Samui’s vibrant beach clubs, top restaurants and the golden sands of Choeng Mon Beach - one of the island’s finest. This is Koh Samui at its most luxurious.

hotels.title: Five-Star Koh Samui Hilltop Escape with All-Pool Villas
hotels.description: A secluded slice of serenity awaits at the hilltop hideaway of Banyan Tree Samui, a five-star pool-villa resort ranked #4 among resorts in Lamai Beach on Koh Samui by Tripadvisor. Here you'll discover true bliss in the form of a private villa with infinity pool overlooking spectacular garden and ocean scenes, an award-winning day spa with 10 treatment rooms, three superb restaurants, and laidback lounge and pool bars. Unwind by your private pool, watching the palm trees sway in the sea breeze. For a touch of self-care, head to the Yoga Centre for complimentary stretching and sun salutations, cosy up in the library and games room with a good book or take the little ones to the fun-filled Kids' Club for arts and crafts, games, and traditional Thai dance classes. When you're ready to head out and explore, the buzzing centre of Lamai Beach, home to restaurants, beach bars and shops, is only a 15-minute drive away. Travel a few minutes further to Fisherman's Village with its boutique cafés, shops and famous night market which backs onto Koh Samui's most famous beach, Bophut Beach, or head to Namuang Waterfalls, a set of two cascades that plummet into a refreshing natural swimming hole

hotels.title: Tranquil Avani Koh Samui Beachfront Escape with Rooftop Lounge
hotels.description: Blissful beach days and sunset cocktails are in abundance at Avani+ Samui Resort, perched on a slice of secluded beachfront on Koh Samui’s quiet southwestern corner. Spend days basking by the swimming pool, feast on authentic Thai or international cuisine at Essence Restaurant or watch the sunset with a drink in hand at the Rooftop Lounge. The AvaniFit fully equipped fitness centre will ensure you won’t have to skip your daily exercise during your escape, and when you’re ready to relax, book in a pampering treatment at the indulgent AvaniSpa.

hotels.title: Five-Star Koh Samui Serene Seaside Stay with Spa
hotels.description: Remarkable seaside vistas meet relaxing indulgence with an escape to Choeng Mon Beach at the Kimpton Kitalay Samui, an IHG Hotel. Indulge in a luxurious treatment at the Pimãanda by HARNN or hit the beach with a kayak for some aquatic adventure. Sample and savour a diverse range of culinary delights at the five onsite restaurants, or relish an ice-cold cocktail while floating in the cool comfort of the Olympic-size swimming pool with ocean views.

hotels.title: Five-Star Koh Samui Oceanfront Luxury with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Rooftop Cocktails
hotels.description: Paradise awaits at the breathtaking Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, built high up on the coastal cliffs overlooking Laem Nan Beach on Koh Samui. Spend balmy days sipping cocktails by the pool while looking out onto jaw-dropping panoramas of the Gulf of Thailand - pure bliss. Two unique onsite restaurants boast these same glorious views while serving up exquisite meals showcasing the flavours of the region. This resort is the perfect relaxation remedy: treat yourself to an indulgent massage at the Silavadee Spa after a long flight before ordering a lavish cocktail at Star rooftop bar at sunset for a truly unforgettable night in. Enjoy luxurious seclusion at Silavadee Pool Spa Resort, set away from the hustle and bustle of Koh Samui’s town centre. A private beach is available exclusively for resort use, which means you can experience some of the island’s best snorkelling away from the crowds. And when you’re ready to venture down from the clifftops and back into civilisation, the town is only a five-minute shuttle bus ride away. **Luxury Escapes inclusions (select nights):** - Wake up to a delicious **daily buffet breakfast** at Moon restaurant - Toast your escape in paradise with a **daily cocktail each** at Star rooftop bar - Enjoy **one signature three-course dinner** for two at Moon or The Height (for stays of 3+ nights) - Convenient **roundtrip airport transfers** in an air-conditioned vehicle (for stays of 3+ nights) - Relax with **one 45-minute foot or head-and-shoulder massage** each (for stays of 5+ nights) **Pool Villa Upgrades available**: Wake up to glorious ocean views from your plush king bed before slipping into a private infinity pool to while away an afternoon in paradise. Please refer to Fine Print for details of renovation works taking place between April 2025 and December 2025.

hotels.title: Koh Samui Five-Star Oceanfront Haven with Clifftop Restaurant & Horizon-Facing Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Lose yourself in stunning panoramas of the Gulf of Thailand from the five-star Six Senses Samui, where a unique location on a sloping headland at the northern tip of the island makes for jaw-dropping ocean views. Take a dip in the horizon-edged infinity pool and spend days on the beach enjoying a variety of watersports. Dine at great heights at Dining on the Rocks, an alfresco restaurant placed on the tip of the headland overlooking the ocean, or head to Drift at the Beach, the new beach bar and poolside lounge, for cocktails and bites. After all that wining and dining, succumb to pampering at the spa and wellness centre, where you can enjoy relaxing treatments like massages and facials, unwind with a steam or sauna session, join a yoga class or try your hand at meditation.

hotels.title: Award-Winning Koh Samui Beachfront Bliss
hotels.description: Discover the true meaning of Thai luxury with an escape to Buri Rasa Village Samui, awarded the Best Luxury Beach Hotel and Best Luxury Boutique Resort - Continent Winner at the REVE Luxury Awards 2025. Perched on the pristine sands of Chaweng, on the east coastline of Koh Samui, this boutique resort offers the best of everything, with lapping crystal-clear waters, lush tropical greenery and vibrant nightlife all just seconds away. Rooms and suites combine traditional southern Thai architecture with contemporary luxury to encourage beachfront bliss from the moment you walk in. Once you’ve explored every indulgent detail, set up for a day of sunshine by the slate-sided pool or white sands of Chaweng Beach, with a soundtrack of lapping water and refreshments courtesy of the Beach Bar. When hunger strikes, venture to the oceanfront Beach Club restaurant, where sensational seafood is transformed into modern Thai dishes, served alongside a selection of wines from the old and new world. When you’re ready to be pampered, Nam Thai Herbal Spa is home to one-of-a-kind treatments in a lush tropical setting, dialling up the relaxation levels to ‘heavenly’.

hotels.title: Idyllic Koh Phangan Private Pool Suites with Luxe Jungle Spa
hotels.description: Enveloped by swaying coconut palms, Anantara Rasananda Koh Phangan Villas combines beachfront bliss and jungle seclusion with luxurious private pool accommodation. Positioned on the shores of the Thong Nai Pan Beach, the resort offers gourmet dining options paired with poolside cocktails, along with wellness treatments from the deluxe spa surrounded by verdant jungle terrain. Take a 40-minute speedboat ride to Koh Samui, where vibrant nightlife and bustling street markets await.

hotels.title: Five-Star Koh Samui Resort with Beachfront Infinity Pool & Onsite Beach Club
hotels.description: Sunkissed luxury awaits at the five-star Anantara Bophut Koh Samui Resort, a beachfront sanctuary overlooking the dazzling Gulf of Thailand. Surrounded by dramatic gardens, sapphire waters and world-class marine life, this opulent retreat will exceed your expectation of paradise with its myriad of luxe facilities. Tantalise your tastebuds with fusion delights at a host of bars and restaurants, including chargrilled favourites at Full Moon, casual breakfast bites at High Tide and tropical cocktails at SEEN Beach Club Samui. Relish lazy days at the Instagram-worthy infinity pool and discover true tranquillity at Anantara Spa. Koh Samui’s flawless beaches, electrifying cuisine and inimitable hospitality make this the perfect escape for dreamers, romantics and families alike.

hotels.title: Koh Samui Modern Oasis on Chaweng Beach with Beach Bars & Lagoon-Style Pools
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the tropical allure of Koh Samui at this stunning beachfront property. Nestled in the lively heart of Chaweng, this modern retreat offers easy access to the city’s most picturesque attractions. Savour a delicious burger at the onsite Cielo Restaurant or explore local flavours at Baantana Thai. Enjoy exotic cocktails at the Cape Diem Beach Bar along with delectable snacks, or relax on the beach for sun-soaked moments. Put on your explorer’s hat and wander through the bustling night markets, treat yourself to a traditional Thai massage at a nearby spa or take a stroll to the pristine Chaweng Beach. For a touch of culture, visit the magnificent Big Buddha Temple, just a short drive away.

hotels.title: Koh Samui Five-Star Boutique Beachside Retreat with Six Infinity Pools
hotels.description: Step onto sun-kissed sands, feel the salt breeze on your face and savour every moment of serenity when you escape to the boutique, five-star InterContinental Koh Samui Resort, dramatically positioned on jungled hilltops overlooking the dazzling Gulf of Thailand. This tranquil oasis boasts six shimmering infinity pools surrounded by sprawling lush gardens, a world-class onsite spa, four mouthwatering restaurants and views of some of the most spectacular sunsets in the world. Koh Samui’s flawless beaches, electrifying cuisine and inimitable hospitality make this the perfect escape for dreamers, romantics or families alike.

hotels.title: Boutique Koh Samui Adults-Only Retro-Cool Oasis on Chaweng Beach
hotels.description: Boutique and brilliantly bodacious, Avani Chaweng Samui Hotel & Beach Club is a retro-cool oasis perfectly positioned on Chaweng Beach’s golden sands. Newly opened in August 2022, this slice of paradise has everything you need to soak up Koh Samui’s chilled-out vibes - sip Long Island iced teas at the upbeat Social Bar, snorkel the magnificent waters of nearby Koh Tan or feast on sushi and sundaes at party-central Seen Beach Club, host to some of the island’s hippest events.

hotels.title: Serene OUTRIGGER Koh Samui Five-Star Beachfront Retreat on Lamai Beach
hotels.description: Discover a captivating blend of old-world charm and tropical tranquillity with a stay at OUTRIGGER Koh Samui Beach Resort, ideally positioned on Lamai Beach’s serene sands. This recently renovated resort brings Outrigger’s iconic reputation for top-notch hospitality to soulful Koh Samui. Savour days spent lazing by shimmering lagoon pools or sipping cocktails on warm sands at the Edgewater Beach Club.

hotels.title: Koh Samui Private Pool Villa Clifftop Escape with Daily Breakfast & Airport Transfers
hotels.description: Embrace the chilled-out vibes of Koh Samui and live it up in true five-star luxury with a villa escape at the clifftop playground of Samujana Villas. Feel like a celebrity staying in one of the resort’s architect-designed villas, all complete with Insta-worthy infinity pools, breathtaking views and inviting open-air living areas. Ideally positioned on a cliffside, granting ocean views and secluded privacy in all villas, this luxe property is what dreams are made of: with palatial villas fitted with lavish facilities, daily butler service to cater for every whim, delicious in-villa dining, a semi-private beach and a blissful spa, you may never want to leave this paradise. This luxurious oasis is also a short drive to a plethora of Koh Samui's most popular bars, restaurants and shops. You’ll also find yourself just a short drive away from Choeng Mon Beach - one of Koh Samui best beaches.

hotels.title: Five-Star Koh Samui Beachfront Escape with Upscale Rooms & Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Discover Koh Samui's laidback island lifestyle at SALA Samui Choengmon Beach Resort. Overlooking Choeng Mon, one of the most pristine beaches on the island, this five-star resort promises sophisticated luxury. Enjoy panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand, explore the spectacular sandy beaches dotted with tropical greenery and calm blue seas, lounge by the infinity pool with a refreshing drink or relax in your tastefully designed room or villa. Enjoy beachfront dining at the al fresco SALA Samui Restaurant, a magical dining space set just metres from the shores of Choeng Mon Beach. Explore the exciting world of Thai and international flavours here, and enjoy your favourite tipples in the casual and relaxed SALA Samui Bar. What's a Thailand vacation without a massage or two? Head to the resort's extensive SALA Spa, where you can take your first step into the wellness journey. When you're feeling active, enjoy daily complimentary yoga classes and complimentary use of kayaks and paddleboards.
